projects.name: (Solana) honest.space Serum, Mango DEX Integrations
projects.desc: Built Serum and Mango DEX integrations, alongside a friend at Solana Hacker House Miami 2022. We also implemented a SOL / USDT Spot

projects.name: lourdesite
projects.desc: A simple NFT minting site I made for a friend back in March 2022

projects.name: ethGasTracker
projects.desc: Built this small CLI tool in Go because I wanted command-line access to Ethereum gas prices

projects.name: Dynamic-Storage-Allocator-C
projects.desc: Custom C implementation of general-purpose dynamic memory allocator, heap consistency checker, and memory leak detector

projects.name: RPi-Kernel-Module-Concurrent-Number-Sieve
projects.desc: A smol C kernel module utilizing basic multi-threaded synchronization and concurrency techniques to compute prime numbers via the Sieve of Eratosthenes algorithm

projects.name: ToyTinyShell-C
projects.desc: Toy Unix shell program in C that supports job control and basic functionality

projects.name: RPi-Kernel-Monitoring-Framework-C
projects.desc: A simple monitoring framework that periodically captures basic information from kernel-space, using kernel timers and kernel threads to manage the frequency and context of such information gathering. Kernel timers are used to schedule recurring events (e.g., thread wakeups) in the future, and kernel threads perform deferrable work inside the kernel.

projects.name: Writing Sample-Writing Culture
projects.desc: An anthology which indicates my passion for writing and anthropology. Created as part of an upper-level course titled 'Writing Culture'. Highly recommend the course!

projects.name: Reimagining the Electric Car: Application of a Dual Motor Drive with a Planetary Gear System to Increase Efficiency
projects.desc: The objective of this project was to optimize the electric car through an innovative motor redesign, in addition to market demonstration of it's viability, alongside adoption via public education campaign. As a team, we managed to receive 1 st Place in the 2014 Technology Challenge Division of Imagine Tomorrow.

projects.name: 2014 National History Day Sr. Group Documentary - The Right to Remain Silent
projects.desc: this documentary focuses on the rights and responsibilities associated with Death with Dignity and assisted dying laws as they evolved throughout US history, particularly in Washington and Oregon state.

projects.name: 2013 National History Day 1st Place Sr. Group Documentary - Nikola Tesla: Electrifying a New Era
projects.desc: This documentary received 1 st Place at the National level in the Senior Group Documentary Division at National History Day 2013. Nikola Tesla's inventions sparked a turning point in history, bringing electricity to all corners of the globe.

projects.name: 2012 National History Day Jr. Group Documentary - Perestroika: Destruction through Reconstruction
projects.desc: This documentary received 7th Place at the National Level, and 1st Place at the Washington state and regional levels. This short video attempts to qualify a paradigm shift (and eventual collapse) of the Soviet Union through economic, political, and cultural lenses.
